name: The Grate Cheesemancer
description:
The Grate Cheesemancer is a game being developed in Unreal Engine 4 that is currently in development. It is a 3rd person puzzle game, set in a Victorian influenced stylized world. You play as Adam the Grated a cheesemancer apprentice with your master Landaff the Grey learning to wield the magical cheese.   Adam is unaware of the danger lurking in plague.

Credits:

Art:  Jacob Kryca, Shayan Syed, Jennifer Creely, Eric Clayton

Programming: Adrian Ratuita, Juan Montenegro

Design: Michail Michail, Anthony Flores, Rogelio Sales

Sound: Crosby Nelson, Jason Fishel
